document_data.name: Binwabi
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Binwabi''' were one of the tribes of the [[Bedine]] people that lived in the desert of [[Anauroch]].

{{Quote|Follow me, Binwabi warriors!|A Bedine warrior entering into the breach at the siege of [[Orofin]].}}
document_data.History: They were among tribes that united together in the {{YearlinkName|1360}} to resist the [[Zhentarim]] campaign of conquest. The tribe fought under the leadership of the sorceress [[Ruha]], who they perceived as the outlander warrior named [[Lander]], in the final battle of the conflict at the ruins of [[Orofin]]. They rushed through a breach in the wall and held their ground until they received reinforcements in the form of 300 of their fellow Bedine warriors.
